batterychargetime: Approximately 2 hours when not in use.
externalpower: 11V-30V DC port for external battery power or use included.
metadatasupport: Automatic camera data and user data such as shot number, filenames and keywords.
controls: On screen touch menus and physical buttons for recording and transport control.
speaker: Integrated mono speaker.
softwareincluded: DaVinci Resolve Lite grading software DVD for Mac OS X and Windows. Blackmagic Media Express software. DiskSpeed Test.
power: Integrated Lithium Ion Polymer rechargeable battery. 11V-30V DC port for external battery power or use included 12V AC adapter.
storageformat: Mac OS Extended or exFAT format. SSDs can be formatted on any Mac or use Mediafour MacDrive (not included) on a Windows PC.
mac: Mac OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion or later.
lensmount: EF and ZE mount compatible with electronic iris control.
compressedrecordingformats: Apple ProRes 422 (HQ) at 3840 x 2160 and 1920 x 1080, visually lossless compressed CinemaDNG RAW at 3840 x 2160 and 1920 x 1080 with either Film or Video Dynamic Range.
computerinterface: Thunderbolt port for capture of HD video and audio. USB 2.0 mini B port for software updates and configuration.
remotecontrol: 1 x 2.5mm LANC for Rec Start/Stop, Iris Control and Focus.
iriscontrol: Iris button automatically adjusts the lens iris settings so no pixel is clipped in film mode. Scene average auto exposure in video mode.
analogaudioinput: 2 x 1/4” jacks for professional balanced analog audio, switchable between mic and line levels.
mountingoptions: 3 x 1/4"-20 UNC thread mounting points on top of camera. 1 x 1/4"-20 UNC thread tripod mount with locator pin.
